response.overview: A couple twins of Azrael,who are in love,make a ablution for the people died in the age of automobile at a abandoned garage-dump.They try to make the Deads understand the different meaning of death.But what people expect,is to come back to the world of living.They always try to elope back to the life while the twins kiss themselves.But they fail all the time.Having no alternative,they start to learn from the twins,how to surpass the power of death "silently".Finally,together with the twins of Azrael,they stride in the brand new world of life.
response.title: An Interior View of Death

release_dates.note: In the Deep of Reality: A Case of Chinese Contemporary Art
